description: Detects a suspicious curl process start on Windows and outputs the requested document to a local file
name: Suspicious Curl Usage on Windows
query: ((process.executable:*\\curl.exe OR Product:"The\ curl\ executable") AND (process.command_line:(*\\AppData\\* OR *\\Users\\Public\\* OR *\\Temp* OR *%AppData%* OR *%Temp%* OR *%Public%* OR *\\Desktop*) OR process.command_line:(*.jpg OR *.jpeg OR *.png OR *.gif OR *.tmp OR *.temp OR *.txt) OR process.command_line:(*\ \-O* OR *\-\-remote\-name*)))
author: Florian Roth
Nasreddine Bencherchali (updated)
